body_html:
My guess is that it's because Sequential only supports single argument forwards.

The fact that Sequential supports only one argument, in my opinion, is a design error.
The implementation of checkpoint_sequential does not limit its use, for example, for ModuleList.

Do you have an example net which is failing to checkpoint because of this?

This happened when I used checkpoint_sequential for ModuleList. I got a strange behavior - ignoring the remaining arguments.

Using only one argument in checkpoint_sequential is not the best option.
